about_SE.title: Meet Bruno
about_SE.name: I'm Bruno Guimarães da Silva
description: I'm a passionate software engineer dedicated to building scalable, high-quality applications that deliver real impact. With deep expertise in PHP, Next.js, and TypeScript, I specialize in crafting robust backend systems and seamless user experiences, always focused on performance, maintainability, and clean architecture.

Originally from Brazil and now expanding my global perspective through international experience in Ireland, I actively mentor startups helping them define technical strategies, optimize workflows, and build resilient engineering foundations.

Driven by curiosity and problem-solving, I thrive in tackling complex challenges across the stack. I'm currently advancing my skills in Go, focusing on high-performance backend development and cloud-native architecture to push the limits of what's possible in modern software.

Outside of tech, I combine creativity and precision in hobbies like assembling custom gaming PCs, advising clients on high-end hardware configurations, and cooking flavorful Italian and Portuguese cuisine. Whether it's building systems or recipes, I bring the same passion for detail, performance, and craft.

list.degree: Postgraduate Degree in Advanced Go Development
list.description: Cutting-edge specialization program focused on building high-performance, production-grade backend systems using Go (Golang). The curriculum dives deep into advanced topics such as concurrency patterns, distributed systems, microservices architecture, clean code, observability, and benchmarking. Emphasizes hands-on projects and real-world practices, leveraging tools like Docker, Kubernetes, gRPC, and Protobuf to prepare developers for cloud-native, scalable software architecture. Developed by experts from one of Brazil’s most respected tech education platforms.

list.degree: Bachelor's Degree in Internet Systems Technology
list.description: Multidisciplinary program designed to prepare professionals for the full lifecycle of web and internet-based software systems. The course combined theoretical foundations with practical application across software engineering, web development, databases, UX/UI, cybersecurity, and mobile applications. Focused on designing, developing, and managing scalable and secure systems using modern technologies and programming languages. Graduates are equipped to work in development, system analysis, and IT consultancy roles in diverse industries.

list.degree: Student Exchange Program – English and Cultural Immersion
list.institution: International School of English (ISE), Dublin, Ireland
list.description: One-year exchange program focused on English fluency, cultural immersion, and global communication. Gained valuable soft skills such as adaptability, teamwork in multicultural environments, and cross-cultural collaboration. Worked part-time and actively participated in local tech meetups, expanding professional network and international perspective.

skills.title: Skills & Expertise
skills.description: With a deep understanding of both frontend and backend technologies, I specialize in building scalable, efficient, and user-friendly applications. My skills are constantly evolving as I explore new frameworks and languages. Here’s a breakdown of my core expertise:

list.name: Next.js
list.description: Building high-performance, SEO-friendly React applications with server-side rendering and static site generation.

list.name: TypeScript
list.description: Strong expertise in TypeScript for better code maintainability, type safety, and cleaner code.

list.name: React
list.description: Extensive experience in developing responsive, interactive user interfaces and optimizing the user experience.

list.name: Chakra UI
list.description: Leveraging Chakra UI to create flexible and accessible component-based designs.

list.name: Ext JS
list.description: Experience in building complex enterprise-level web applications with Ext JS, focusing on advanced data grids and UI components.

list.name: PHP
list.description: Over 5 years of experience with PHP, including versions 5.2, 7.4, and 8.1. Proficient in developing dynamic websites and APIs, and optimizing legacy systems.

list.name: Go (Golang)
list.description: Currently expanding my skills as a Go developer, focusing on building high-performance and scalable backend services.

list.name: Microservices Architecture
list.description: Contributed to transitioning legacy monolithic applications to microservices, improving scalability and team collaboration.

list.name: Clean Architecture
list.description: Strong focus on creating maintainable, scalable, and testable systems using Clean Architecture principles for both backend and frontend.

list.name: Performance Optimization
list.description: Focus on improving application performance, including reducing load times, optimizing database queries, and enhancing the overall user experience.

list.name: Scalability
list.description: Expertise in designing systems that can scale as demand grows, whether by refactoring monolithic systems into microservices or optimizing backend architectures.

list.name: Code Quality
list.description: Adherence to industry best practices and a commitment to writing clean, maintainable code. I'm a strong advocate for test-driven development (TDD) and code reviews to maintain high standards.

list.name: AWS
list.description: Experience with AWS services, including EC2, S3, and RDS, for deploying and managing applications in the cloud.

list.name: Docker
list.description: Utilizing Docker for containerization to ensure consistent environments across development, testing, and production.

list.name: CI/CD
list.description: Implementing continuous integration and continuous deployment pipelines to automate testing and deployment processes.

list.name: Agile Methodologies
list.description: Experience working in Agile environments, including Scrum and Kanban, to deliver projects efficiently.

list.name: Team Leadership
list.description: Proven experience in mentoring teams and leading technical decision-making processes.

list.name: Collaboration
list.description: Working closely with cross-functional teams (designers, product managers, and other developers) to deliver impactful features and solutions.

list.name: Adaptability
list.description: Quickly adapting to new technologies and environments, ensuring a smooth transition for teams and products.
